message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm proposing an initial price of $14,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $12,000 is below the product's true value.  I could consider letting it go for $13,500. It's a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $13,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $13,000. I think it's a fair price considering my budget and the product's value.
